name: Super Lula Escape From Prison
description:
FEATURES
  • Physics Based Horizontal Shooter.
  • INFINITE REPLAYABILITY: Procedural random adventure.
  • Pixel Art old school arcades.
  • Unlockable Characters.
  • Crazy Food Items.
  • Epic Characters Voices .
  • Worldwide Leaderboards.
  • First game in the Miner Ultra Universe that has achievements.
  • Special Collectors Edition.
  • Adrenaline gameplay.

E o a mais engraçado é que tudo acaba em pizza maluca kkkkkkkk !!!!!!!!
